The user requested the addition of a hadoken button and an email form. The AI acknowledged the user's request to add a hadoken button to the project, asking for details on its positioning and action when pressed. Two options were provided for both questions: the positioning of the button at either the bottom or the top of the screen, and the action of displaying an animation or playing a sound effect when pressed. Later, the user reiterated the request for the email form, indicating it should be included as a way to contact Santa. The AI responded positively, asking for more details about the project to better assist with the email form.
